item.title: About
item.description: My name is Will Pierce. I work as a technical writer and researcher, especially in the area information security. I’ve contributed documentation and code to open source projects including SecureDrop, Qubes OS, signal-protocol, OpenOversight, Flux, and the Rust langauge. Before working in technology, I did doctoral research in English literature at Northwestern University, working on a dissertation about surveillance and theology in Elizabethan England.
